blocks.className: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border border-primary/20 bg-primary/10 px-3 py-1 text-xs font-medium text-primary mb-4

blocks.text: Everything you need to know about our platform. Can't find what you're looking for? Reach out to our support team.

faqItems.a: Getting started is easy. Simply create a free account, choose your plan, and start building. Our onboarding wizard will guide you through the setup process step by step.

faqItems.q: Is there a free trial available?
faqItems.a: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required. You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel at any time.

faqItems.q: Can I change my plan later?
faqItems.a: Absolutely. You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time from your account settings. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate any differences.

faqItems.q: What kind of support do you offer?
faqItems.a: We provide 24/7 support through live chat, email, and our comprehensive documentation. Enterprise customers also get a dedicated account manager and priority support.
Security is our top priority. We use enterprise-grade encryption, regular security audits, and comply with SOC 2, GDPR, and HIPAA standards to keep your data safe.
